statements: SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_details FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name LIKE '%acetaminophen%';
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, interaction_details FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_details IS NOT NULL;
SELECT drug_name, adverse_effects FROM drug_interactions ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_details FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, adverse_effects FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name = 'Paracetamol' AND interaction_details LIKE '%interaction%' ORDER BY drug_id DESC;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_details, adverse_effects FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_details IS NOT NULL AND adverse_effects IS NOT NULL;
SELECT drug_name AS 'Drug Name', CONCAT('Adverse Effects: ', adverse_effects) AS 'Information' FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT drug_name FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT effect_name FROM adverse_effects WHERE effect_description LIKE '%severe%';
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_id = 123 ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT drug_id, drug_name FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND interaction_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT MAX(interaction_id) AS max_interaction_id, MIN(interaction_id) AS min_interaction_id FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_description LIKE '%severe%' AND drug_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM drug_details WHERE dosage > 50
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM drug_details WHERE drug_id = 100
SELECT effect_description FROM adverse_effects WHERE severe = TRUE
SELECT drug_id, interaction_description FROM interactions ORDER BY drug_id DESC
SELECT * FROM drug_details INNER JOIN adverse_effects ON drug_details.drug_id = adverse_effects.effect_id
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM drug_details WHERE manufacturer='Pfizer'
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM drug_details WHERE dosage > 50
SELECT effect_description, severe FROM adverse_effects ORDER BY effect_id DESC
SELECT interaction_description FROM interactions WHERE drug_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT drug_name, dosage, manufacturer FROM drug_details JOIN interactions ON drug_details.drug_id = interactions.drug_id
SELECT * FROM Drug_Interactions;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Severe';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM Drug_Usage ORDER BY drug_name ASC, usage_id DESC;
SELECT drug_name, effect_description FROM Adverse_Effects WHERE effect_description LIKE '%allergic%';
SELECT * FROM Drug_Interactions WHERE interaction_type='Severe' ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM Drug_Interactions GROUP BY drug_name HAVING interaction_count > 1;

SELECT p.patient_name, d.drug_name, a.effect_description FROM Patients p JOIN Drug_Usage du ON p.patient_id = du.patient_id JOIN Adverse_Effects a ON du.drug_name = a.drug_name JOIN Drug_Interactions d ON a.drug_name = d.drug_name WHERE d.interaction_type='Moderate';
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name, dosage FROM Drug_Usage WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%' ORDER BY drug_name DESC, usage_id ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT a.effect_description, COUNT(*) AS effect_count FROM Adverse_Effects a JOIN Drug_Interactions d ON a.drug_name = d.drug_name WHERE d.interaction_type='Minor' GROUP BY a.effect_description HAVING effect_count > 1;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM DrugInteractions;
SELECT effect_name, severity_level FROM AdverseEffects WHERE is_serious = TRUE;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientData ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_notes FROM InteractionLog ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM DrugInteractions ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientData WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT interaction_description FROM DrugInteractions WHERE interaction_id = 3;
SELECT patient_name, effect_name, severity_level FROM PatientData JOIN AdverseEffects ON PatientData.patient_id = AdverseEffects.effect_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM InteractionLog WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
